程序包 cn.piesat.nj.timer

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    AsyncHashedWheelTimer.TaskFailedCallback  
    Timeout
    A handle associated with a TimerTask that is returned by a Timer.
    Timer
    Schedules TimerTasks for one-time future execution in a background thread.
    TimerTask
    A task which is executed after the delay specified with Timer#newTimeout(TimerTask, long, TimeUnit).
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AsyncHashedWheelTimer
    execute TimerTask async
    HashedWheelTimer
    Implementation Details HashedWheelTimer is based on George Varghese and Tony Lauck's paper, 'Hashed and Hierarchical Timing Wheels: data structures to efficiently implement a timer facility'.
    HashedWheelTimer.HashedWheelBucket
    Bucket that stores HashedWheelTimeouts.
    HashedWheelTimer.HashedWheelTimeout  
    TimerManager
    .定时器管理类 - 初始化定时器 - 增加定时任务 - 移除定时任务 注: 如果定时任务执行间隔与 时间轮的扫描间隔相同， 则表现出会延迟一个 tick(建议定时器的tick间隔时间单位精确于定时任务的时间间隔)
    TimerManager.TimerConfig
    定时器配置
